reviewText: We watch this video every 2 years at our work because it is so informative and it is entertaining. It is essential for any office environment.

This was great training. Robert Stevenson is knowledgeable and thought provoking. There were lots of great stories to illustrate his points and he is just an entertaining speaker. He not only explains what great customer service looks like, he helps you to understand how to create a culture of customer service excellence. Great program!
This is a great source of information and examples of customer service excellence.  I appreciate being able to have this information at an affordable price!
